StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: A genome wide study of lung cancer in never smokers

Person.Organization: DARTMOUTH COLLEGEUNIVERSITY OF TX MD ANDERSON CAN CTR

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: Funding support for the samples used in the study was provided through the NIH grants R01 CA055769, 2RO1 CA60691-03, RO3 CA 77118-2, R01 CA 80127, Mayo Clinic Foundation, R01 CA115857, R01 CA 84354, UO1 CA76293, R01 CA704386, R01 CA092824, R01 P50 CA090578, Ontario Institute for Cancer Research grant, Liverpool Lung Project from Roy Castle Lung Cancer Foundation, and CRC337 Cancer Research UK. The genotyping was supported by the NCI grant R01 CA149462. The datasets used for the analyses described in this manuscript were obtained from dbGaP found at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/projects/gap/cgi-bin/study.cgi?study_id=phs000634.v1.p1 through dbGaP study accession number phs000634.v1.p1.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Exchange Area
ConsentGroup.name: EA
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Pre-release exchange area for use by study investigators only.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cancer)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CA
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Cancer.
General methods development research is NOT permitted.
